name: John Smith
summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years building scalable web applications. Expert in TypeScript, React, and Node.js. Led teams of 5-10 engineers delivering high-impact products.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led development of customer-facing dashboard serving 100K+ daily users. Reduced API latency by 40% through caching and query optimization.
highlights: Led development of customer-facing dashboard serving 100K+ daily users
Reduced API latency by 40% through caching and query optimization
Mentored 5 junior engineers through code reviews and pair programming
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

experience.title: Software Engineer

highlights: Built real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
